title: 2016 European Union Referendum (Brexit)
description_short: List of campaign websites from the 2016 United Kingdom EU Referendum (Brexit).
description_long: On 23 June 2016, the United Kingdom held a referendum to decide whether or not the country should remain a member of the European Union. The table below lists campaign organisations and their position on the issue (leave, remain or unknown), along with links to live and archived versions of their websites.
